evidence.claim: TRIMEDX leverages AWS for scalable cloud infrastructure.
The company is HIPAA compliant, ensuring protected health information is handled appropriately.
TRIMEDX uses FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
Integration with EHR platforms follows HL7 standards at TRIMEDX.
TRIMEDX utilizes X12 transaction sets for billing processes.

icp.icp_reason: TRIMEDX uses X12 and HIPAA standards, indicating they may send/receive relevant X12 transactions.
